item.title: Video Editor to complete HR video - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for someone to complete our HR video about a 'Change Maker' in our company.
The videos have been previously shot and an adobe premier project has been started.

The videographer states there are some sound issues in one of the videos and auto-tracking was set on one of the shots so we may not be able to use that particular video. We would like to see what we can salvage out of that. We would also like to add some light background music to the video but have not picked out that music yet. We're open to suggestions.

For the style of video think Chick-Fil-A commercials but longer.

I will send the video outline and "script" to you once hired.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 25, 2024 12:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
